name: Talk_Civ4
_source: speak;Villager Girl;General Selena, oh I hope to see you soon!
speak;Villager Girl;Of course!|She's amazing!|Everyone says she's one of the greatest knights in all of Grado.|Strong and graceful, like a true hero!|Do you think I could be like her someday?

speak;Ephraim;With dedication and training, anything is possible.|But remember, true strength comes from protecting those you care about.|That's what General Duessel taught m-, erm...|That's what I heard General Duessel say from someone.
speak;Villager Girl;General Duessel is so old and scary...but I'll remember that!|I'm going to train every single day!|Just you wait and see!
